#Tender Announcement for Cleaning Services - La Macaza Institution

**Tender Reference Information**
* **Title**: Cleaning Services - La Macaza Institution
* **Reference Number**: CB-794-13471125
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: 21301-25-4679509
* **Publication Date**: May 16, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 25, 2024 at 08:00:00

**Project Details**
* **Contracting Entity**: Correctional Service Canada
* **Address**: 250 Montée St-François, Laval, Quebec J0K2T0, Canada
* **End User Entity**: La Macaza Institution, 321, chemin de l’Aéroport, La Macaza, QC J0T 1R0, Canada
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer (Demands d’offre à commandes)
* **Notice URL**: Not available

**Tender Description**
The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to provide cleaning services at the La Macaza Institution. The services include cleaning of the institution’s areas at the frequency specified in the Statement of Work (Annex A).

**Contract Details**
* **Duration**: From the date of contract award to August 31, 2025, with an option to renew for two (2) additional one-year periods.
* **Contract Type**: Standing Offer

**Security Requirements**
The offer is valid to Quebec region only. Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC) offers seminars to businesses interested in learning how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada.

** tender Description and Evaluation Criteria**
The bidder must provide the labour to perform cleaning services at the La Macaza Institution. The bidder must provide the labour required to perform the cleaning services. CSC will provide cleaning products and equipment will be available to the bidder in each area. Any conditions for participation of suppliers not specified in solicitation documentation: none.
